[Posting two days late. No proposal review meeting next week due to US holiday and [Go quiet week](https://github.com/golang/go/wiki/Quiet-Weeks).]

**2022-06-29 / @rsc, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @bradfitz, @andybons**

**Accepted**

- **net/http/httputil: replace Director with Rewrite** [#53002](https://golang.org/issue/53002)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **encoding/binary: 32-bit and 16-bit values** [#53353](https://golang.org/issue/53353)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**

  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥

  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥

  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **strings: add StripSlashes like PHP stripslashes** [#43579](https://golang.org/issue/43579)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
